name: It's My Circus
overview: Have you got what it takes to become the greatest circus performer ? Develop your skills with over 40 fun challenges and games and build a career that will make you the star of the big top! Customise your player and update your outfits and you progress and unlock tons of fun clothes and goodies. Or, go up against your friends and family with 12 mutliplayer games and see who will win the most prizes! With classic circus games like throwing clown pies, the strongest man and tightrope walking This original game is action packed and fun for everyone.
